description: Connect to LangGraph agents via the LangGraph Platform API

credential_fields.label: LangGraph API Base
credential_fields.tooltip: The base URL for your LangGraph server (e.g., http://localhost:2024 or your deployed LangGraph Cloud URL)

credential_fields.label: LangGraph API Key
credential_fields.tooltip: API key for authenticating with your LangGraph server (optional for local development)

description: Connect to Amazon Bedrock AgentCore hosted agent runtimes

credential_fields.label: Agent Runtime ARN
credential_fields.tooltip: The ARN of your Bedrock AgentCore runtime. Find this in your AWS Bedrock console under AgentCore.
